review: it is very good movie actors acting were too good specially irfan kan sir and rajpal yadavs sirs has acted really well . it's very emotional movie sharukh khan's name was changed sahir khan and akshay kumar name changed and turned into abhay kumar . last scene i was crying when shahrukh khan visited in irfan khan's house they were talking about childhood memories and shahrukh khan telling him you have to come in my house with your children and with your wife as well and people were cheering up to irfan kan because he was saying truth' to them .

the entire plot of the movie was so 'classy' exactly like the stories i used to read in my childhood back in the days where the internet was not as widely distributed as today. i think many of us will be able to connect to the characters in the movie and may even be dragged towards the 'nostalgic' past. in my opinion, irrfan khan pulled the lead role very beautifully and all the other main characters including shahrukh khan very good.
